DataElement.preferredName: New Personal Medical History Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Having no previous example or precedent or parallel; of a kind not seen before._A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies._The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.
